synopsis.text: Corporation head Lin Qinghan finds herself in a precarious situation as her grandfather's life hangs in the balance. Unscrupulous relatives, indifferent to the Lin Group's stability, employ devious schemes to seize control of the family's assets, even going so far as to frame Qinghan herself. However, her formidable husband, Zhang Xuan, known ominously as 'Satan' and revered as the lord of the Dragon King Palace, systematically dismantles each obstacle that threatens to bring her down.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
